amendment.description: To require a report on procedures and guidelines in the event of further sectarian violence.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4913 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4913 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9090-9091) To require a report on procedures and guidelines in the event of further sectarian violence.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4913 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4913 proposed by Senator Boxer.
